filters.day.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {DAY} other {#D}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#d}', wrong '{#d.}').

filters.week.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {WEEK} other {#W}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#w}', wrong '{#w.}').

filters.month.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {MONTH} other {#M}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#m}', wrong '{#m.}').

filters.quarter.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {QUARTER} other {#Q}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#q}', wrong '{#q.}').

filters.year.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {YEAR} other {#Y}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#y}', wrong '{#y.}').

filters.alertMessage.relativePreset.inPe.comment: Don't translate placeholders '{calendarIcon}', '{range}'. Example text: 'in period (calendar) from 2 months ago to 2 months ahead'

filters.config.warning.multipleProjectCo.value: There is more than one project date filter configuration associated with this project. The first one was used.
filters.config.warning.multipleProjectCo.comment: Displayed if there is more than one project date filter configuration associated with the project.

filters.config.warning.multipleWorkspace.value: There is more than one workspace date filter configuration associated with this workspace. The first one was used.
filters.config.warning.multipleWorkspace.comment: Displayed if there is more than one workspace date filter configuration associated with the workspace.

filters.config.warning.selectedFilterNot.value: The default filter option is not valid, using the first option available instead.
filters.config.warning.selectedFilterNot.comment: Displayed if the default option for new dashboards is not valid.

filters.config.warning.allOptionsHidden.value: The dashboard date filter configuration was ignored because it would have hidden all the filter options.
filters.config.warning.allOptionsHidden.comment: Displayed if applying a dashboard config would make all the filter options hidden.

filters.config.warning.conflictingIdenti.value: The dashboard date filter configuration was ignored because it contains date filter options with identical identifiers.
filters.config.warning.conflictingIdenti.comment: Displayed if applying a dashboard config would make it contain more than one option with the same identifier.

filters.config.warning.notAvailable.value: The project date filter configuration is either not defined or you do not have the permissions to access it.
filters.config.warning.notAvailable.comment: Displayed if there is an error getting the project level config.

filters.config.warning.workspace.notAvai.value: The workspace date filter configuration is either not defined or you do not have the permissions to access it.
filters.config.warning.workspace.notAvai.comment: Displayed if there is an error getting the workspace level config.

kpi.noData.value: No data for current filter settings. Try changing the filters.

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.types.wee.comment: Example: 'Weekly on Friday'. Placeholder '{day}' refers to a day of a week. Don't translate placeholder '{day}'.

configurationPanel.zoomInsight.help|insi.value: Enable to zoom the insight to display a detailed view. Hold the shift key to pan the zoomed area.

configurationPanel.zoomInsight.help|repo.value: Enable to zoom the report to display a detailed view. Hold the shift key to pan the zoomed area.

configurationPanel.zoomInsight.notice.value: Zoom will not be applied to exported dashboards

configurationPanel.drillConfig.selectIns.comment: Hint guiding users that drill target insight in select box has to be selected. Use '…' as one character, not 3 dots ('...').
Hint guiding users that drill target report in select box has to be selected. Use '…' as one character, not 3 dots ('...').

layout.widget.width.min.value: Widget is at the minimal width
layout.widget.width.min.comment: Shown as red text inside of widget if resized under min limit.

layout.widget.width.max.value: Widget is at the maximal width
layout.widget.width.max.comment: Shown as red text inside of widget if resized under max limit.

layout.widget.height.min.value: Widget is at the minimal height
layout.widget.height.min.comment: Shown as red text inside of widget if resized under min limit.

layout.widget.height.max.value: Widget is at the maximal height
layout.widget.height.max.comment: Shown as red text inside of widget if resized under max limit.

dropzone.new.row.desc.comment: Used as placeholder when user drags some widget and tries to drop it on dashboard. Dropping the widget over such placeholder creates new section of a dashboard. Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <>. Translate words 'new section'.

dropzone.widget.desc.comment: Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <>. Translate word 'here'.

dropzone.widget.last.in.row.desc.comment: Used as placeholder when user drags some widget and tries to drop it on dashboard. Dropping the widget over such placeholder will cause adding the widget to an existing section of a dashboard. Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <>. Translate words 'existing section'.

deleteKpiConfirmationDialog.message.value: All alerts set up for this KPI will also be deleted.

newDashboard.dropInsight|insight.comment: A placeholder showed when user drags new insight into a dashboard canvas by cursor (drag and drop).

newDashboard.dropInsight|report.comment: A placeholder showed when user drags new report into a dashboard canvas by cursor (drag and drop).

attributesDropdown.filterConfiguredMessa.value: {parentTitle} is already filtered by {childTitle} filter directly or through other filters.
attributesDropdown.filterConfiguredMessa.comment: Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <> and placeholders enclosed in {}.

attributesDropdown.attributeNameWithData.comment: Will be used in sentence between two nouns. For instance 'Filter by AttributeX with data of MetricY'
